report.title: Single user statistics
report.description: Stats for Beach Track track recorders
report.query: select #columns# from ( select created_by_id, row_number() over (order by count(distinct s.id) desc) as league_position from samples where survey_id=721 and sample_method_id=2424 group by created_by_id ) as league join samples s on s.survey_id=721 and s.sample_method_id=2424 and s.deleted=false and s.created_by_id=league.created_by_id join sample_attribute_values vd on vd.sample_id=s.id and vd.sample_attribute_id=1717 and vd.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values vdist on vdist.sample_id=s.id and vdist.sample_attribute_id=1718 and vdist.deleted=false where league.created_by_id=#created_by_id#

column.name: total_occurrences_count
column.sql: (select count(*) from occurrences where created_by_id=#created_by_id# and website_id=153 and deleted=false)
